projectName: Gas Town UI - Design Improvements Phase 1
projectDescription: Comprehensive UI/UX improvements across desktop, tablet, and mobile based on design audit.

userStories.title: Fix Floating Search Button Position on Mobile
userStories.scope: Apply CSS fix to position floating search button correctly on mobile (avoid content overlap). Move to bottom: calc(80px + env(safe-area-inset-bottom))
acceptanceCriteria: Search button positioned above bottom nav on mobile
Button doesn't overlap content on small screens
Safe area insets respected on iOS (notch, home indicator)
Button visible on all viewport sizes (375px+)
Verified with dev-browser skill (375x667 mobile viewport)
testCommands: dev-browser: navigate to http://localhost:5173, verify search button position at 375x667

userStories.title: Hide Sidebar on Mobile, Implement Drawer
userStories.scope: Hide sidebar on mobile (max-width: 768px), make it a sliding drawer that opens from left. Apply CSS transitions and backdrop.
acceptanceCriteria: Main content spans full width on mobile
Sidebar slides in from left when toggled
Backdrop dims content when sidebar open
Sidebar toggle button visible on mobile

userStories.title: Increase Bottom Navigation Touch Targets
userStories.scope: Bottom nav height to 64px, nav items minimum 48px height, adequate padding. All touch targets ≥44x44px.
testCommands: dev-browser: verify touch targets on mobile (375x667)

userStories.title: Icon System Overhaul - Replace with Lucide Icons
userStories.scope: Replace all sidebar icons: Work (target→briefcase-list), Workflows (flask→git-branch), Dogs (gear→shield), Rigs (chart→server). Ensure consistent 20px size, 1.5px stroke, orange active state (#F97316).
acceptanceCriteria: All icons from Lucide library (already installed)
Work icon changed to briefcase-list or checkbox-list
Verified in browser at desktop, tablet, mobile
testCommands: dev-browser: verify icons on all breakpoints

userStories.title: Page Title Standardization Across All Pages
userStories.scope: Standardize page titles: use Title Case, 24px semi-bold on desktop/20px on mobile, consistent left alignment, remove orange accent bar or apply consistently.
acceptanceCriteria: All page titles use Title Case (e.g., 'Mail Inbox', not 'MAIL INBOX')
Orange accent bar: either removed OR applied consistently to all pages
Verified on: Dashboard, Mail, Work, Agents, Workflows, Rigs, Queue, Convoys
testCommands: dev-browser: verify all main pages for title consistency

userStories.title: Color System Enhancement - Status Colors
userStories.scope: Define and apply status colors globally. Success: #22C55E, Warning: #F59E0B, Error: #EF4444, Info: #3B82F6. Primary CTA: #F97316. Apply to badges, indicators, buttons.
acceptanceCriteria: Status colors defined in CSS/Tailwind theme
Unread indicators: bold blue dot (8px) + semi-bold text
Status colors applied to: badges, buttons, indicators, spinners
Colors verified for contrast (WCAG AA minimum 4.5:1)
testCommands: dev-browser: verify color consistency across components

userStories.title: Typography Scale Implementation
userStories.scope: Define typography scale. H1: 24px/1.2 semi-bold, H2: 20px/1.3 semi-bold, H3: 16px/1.4 medium, Body: 14px/1.5, Small: 12px/1.4, Code: JetBrains Mono 13px.
acceptanceCriteria: Scale applied consistently across all pages
testCommands: dev-browser: verify typography on all pages

userStories.title: Agent Cards Enhancement - Visual Hierarchy
userStories.scope: Redesign agent cards: agent name (16px semi-bold), role icon (12px muted), status badge with pulse animation for running, role-specific left border (4px) with color coding (Coordinator: Blue, Health-check: Green, Witness: Purple, Refinery: Orange, Crew: Gray).
acceptanceCriteria: Role: displayed with icon (12px, muted color)
Status badge: shows IDLE/RUNNING with appropriate colors
Running agents: green pulse animation on status dot
Cards have hover state: subtle elevation increase
Verified on Dashboard page at all breakpoints
testCommands: dev-browser: navigate to Dashboard, verify agent cards

userStories.title: Work Page Form Layout Optimization
userStories.scope: Optimize form: max-width 640px, centered, required fields marked with red asterisk, distinct dropdown styling with chevron icon, 24px vertical section spacing, 12px field spacing.
acceptanceCriteria: Required fields: marked with red asterisk (*)
Select styling: distinct from text inputs (border/background)
Form sections logically grouped in cards
Responsive: works on mobile (375px+), tablet, desktop
testCommands: dev-browser: navigate to Work page, test form at multiple breakpoints

userStories.title: CTA Button Enhancement - Primary Actions
userStories.scope: Enhance primary CTA buttons: background #F97316 with white text, hover (darken 10%), active (darken 15%), loading spinner state, disabled (50% opacity), minimum 120px width, 12px 24px padding.
acceptanceCriteria: Loading state: spinner icon, text hidden
Applied to: Create Issue, Submit, etc.
Verified on Work page and across app
testCommands: dev-browser: test button states on Work page

userStories.title: Issue Type Selection Component Enhancement
userStories.scope: Enhance issue type checkboxes: hover background (#F3F4F6), selected items have orange left border (3px), checkmarks orange, grouped in card with border, descriptive icons.
acceptanceCriteria: Grouped in card with subtle border
Each issue type has descriptive icon
testCommands: dev-browser: navigate to Work page, test issue type selection

userStories.title: Workflow Progress Visualization - Circular Indicators
userStories.scope: Add circular progress rings for workflow items: 24px diameter, brand orange fill, clock icon for 'Pending', checkmark for 'Completed', hover tooltip, clickable to navigate.
acceptanceCriteria: Percentage workflows: circular progress ring (24px diameter)
Pending status: clock icon + yellow dot
Completed status: checkmark icon + green dot
testCommands: dev-browser: navigate to Dashboard, verify workflow progress

userStories.title: System Stats Cards - Icon & Sparkline
userStories.scope: Enhance stats cards: include descriptive icon, stat value 32px bold, up/down arrow indicator for changes, tooltip for comparison period, 48px wide sparkline showing 7-day trend, clickable navigation.
acceptanceCriteria: Each stat card: descriptive icon (12px, muted)
Tooltip: explains comparison ('vs. yesterday', 'vs. last week')
Cards clickable: navigate to detail page
testCommands: dev-browser: navigate to Dashboard, verify stats cards

userStories.title: Agents Page - Card Redesign with Role Icons
userStories.scope: Redesign agent cards: display avatar/icon (40px), role-specific icons, status labels clear, uptime percentage with label, efficiency score, last seen timestamp, all with consistent styling.
acceptanceCriteria: Status: clear label and color coding
Last seen: timestamp or relative time
Consistent styling with agent cards enhancement
testCommands: dev-browser: navigate to Agents page, verify card redesign

userStories.title: Mail Page - Split View Layout on Desktop
userStories.scope: Implement split-view layout for desktop: list on left (30%), content on right (70%), draggable divider, responsive collapse on tablet/mobile.
acceptanceCriteria: Draggable divider: resize columns (min 200px list, min 400px content)
Tablet (768px-1023px): stack vertically or hide list
Mobile (≤767px): full-width list view, swipe to detail
Verified on Mail page at all breakpoints

userStories.title: Unread Indicators Enhancement - Bold Blue Dots
userStories.scope: Enhance unread indicators: bold blue dot (8px) + semi-bold text, applied consistently across Mail, Messages, Notifications. Clear when item marked as read.
acceptanceCriteria: Indicator on left or right (consistent per page)
Applied to: Mail, Messages, Notifications, Comments
testCommands: dev-browser: verify unread indicators on Mail page

userStories.title: Remove or Reduce Background Dot Patterns
userStories.scope: Remove or reduce opacity of background dot patterns to <5%. Replace with subtle elevation (shadow-sm) on cards instead.
acceptanceCriteria: Background dot patterns removed OR opacity <5%
Card backgrounds: use shadow-sm for elevation
testCommands: dev-browser: verify no distracting dot patterns

userStories.title: Bottom Navigation 'More' Menu - Slide-Up Sheet
userStories.scope: Implement 'More' menu as slide-up sheet: backdrop dims content, tap backdrop closes, swipe down closes, menu items 52px+ height, active page highlighted, focus trap, Escape closes.
acceptanceCriteria: More menu slides up smoothly from bottom
Active page highlighted in More menu
More button shows indicator when active page in menu
testCommands: dev-browser: test More menu on mobile, verify all interactions

userStories.title: Touch Target Sizing Across All Interactive Elements
userStories.scope: Ensure all interactive elements meet touch target minimums: Bottom nav 48x48px, Sidebar items 44x48px, Icon buttons 44x44px, List items 48px+, Form inputs 44px+, Checkboxes 44x44px tap area.
acceptanceCriteria: Touch targets don't overlap (8px gap minimum)
testCommands: dev-browser: verify touch targets on mobile

userStories.title: Loading States & Skeleton Loaders
userStories.scope: Implement skeleton loaders for async content. Show placeholder lines while loading. Apply to: agent cards, mail lists, work items, stats cards.
acceptanceCriteria: Skeleton loaders for main content areas
Loading state: subtle animation (pulsing or shimmer)
Applied to: agent cards, mail lists, work items, stats
Verified on Dashboard, Mail, Agents pages

userStories.title: Error States & Retry Buttons
userStories.scope: Implement error state designs: error icon, message text, retry button. Applied consistently across pages when data fetch fails.
acceptanceCriteria: Error state layout: icon + message + retry button
Message: clear description of what failed
Retry button: same styling as primary CTA
Applied to: agent cards, mail, work items, stats

userStories.title: Empty State Designs & Illustrations
userStories.scope: Design and implement empty states for pages with no data: Mail (no messages), Agents (none running), Workflows (no workflows). Include icon, message, and optional CTA.
acceptanceCriteria: Empty state layouts: icon + message + optional CTA
CTA: suggests next action (e.g., 'Create First Workflow')
Applied to: Mail, Agents, Workflows, Queue, etc.

userStories.title: Responsive Layout Bug Fixes - Content Overflow
userStories.scope: Fix content overflow issues: page-content min-width 0 & overflow-x hidden, card max-width 100% & overflow hidden, ensure no horizontal scroll on mobile.
acceptanceCriteria: All content visible and properly constrained
Tables/code blocks: horizontal scroll within container (not page)

userStories.title: Terminology Consistency - Alerts vs Escalations
userStories.scope: Audit and standardize terminology across app: decide on 'Alerts' vs 'Escalations', apply consistently in sidebar, pages, buttons, help text.
acceptanceCriteria: Consistent term used across: sidebar, pages, buttons
Updated in all help text and descriptions

userStories.title: Haptic Feedback for Mobile Actions
userStories.scope: Add haptic feedback (vibration) for important actions: button clicks, form submission, error states. Light feedback for normal actions, success/error patterns.
acceptanceCriteria: Only on devices that support vibration
Verified on mobile device or emulator
testCommands: dev-browser: test on mobile with vibration support

userStories.title: Gesture Support - Swipe Navigation & Pull-to-Refresh
userStories.scope: Implement gesture support: swipe-right to go back, swipe-left for next, pull-to-refresh on list pages. Create reusable swipe action.
acceptanceCriteria: Pull-to-refresh on list pages (Mail, Agents, Queue)
Verified with dev-browser or real device
testCommands: dev-browser: test gesture support on mobile

userStories.title: Compose Button Visibility & Accessibility
userStories.scope: Ensure compose/create button is always visible and accessible. On mobile: floating action button (FAB) or bottom nav item. On desktop: header or sidebar button.
acceptanceCriteria: Compose button visible on all pages
Desktop: prominent in header or sidebar
Mobile: FAB (56x56px) or bottom nav item
Verified across all pages and devices
testCommands: dev-browser: test on desktop and mobile

userStories.title: Keyboard Navigation & Screen Reader Testing
userStories.scope: Ensure all pages support keyboard navigation: Tab order logical, focus visible, no keyboard traps. Screen reader announces correctly: landmarks, headings, labels, status.
acceptanceCriteria: Keyboard navigation: Tab through all interactive elements
Focus indicators: always visible (2px border or background)
No keyboard traps (can Tab out of all components)
Screen reader: announces form labels and errors
Screen reader: announces dynamic status changes
Tested with keyboard and screen reader (NVDA/JAWS/VoiceOver)
testCommands: dev-browser: test keyboard navigation on all pages

userStories.title: Dark Mode Appearance Verification
userStories.scope: Verify all improvements look correct in dark mode. Check: colors have sufficient contrast, text readable, icons visible, no dark-on-dark or light-on-light.
acceptanceCriteria: All colors pass WCAG AA contrast (4.5:1 for text)
No dark backgrounds with dark icons
No light backgrounds with light text
testCommands: dev-browser: toggle dark mode, verify all pages

userStories.title: Performance Verification - Load Time <3s
userStories.scope: Verify all pages load in <3s on 3G connection. Check: bundle size, lazy loading, image optimization, CSS/JS metrics.
acceptanceCriteria: All pages load in <3s on 3G throttling

userStories.title: Test Coverage - Cross-Browser Compatibility
userStories.scope: Verify all improvements work across browsers: Chrome, Safari, Firefox on desktop. iOS Safari, Android Chrome on mobile.
acceptanceCriteria: No console errors on any browser

userStories.title: Update AGENTS.md with Discovered Patterns
userStories.scope: After each iteration, document patterns discovered: icon usage, color conventions, responsive breakpoints, gotchas, component locations. Keep AGENTS.md updated for future iterations.
acceptanceCriteria: Gotchas noted (e.g., safe area insets on iOS)
